Seal characters (1)

爟字的基本解释

爟
guàn
举火：“司爟掌行火之政令。”
〔爟火〕古代祭祀袚除不祥所举的火把。
古代边防报警的烽火：“爟烽未息。”

爟字的汉语字典释义

[①]［guàn］
［《廣韻》古玩切，去换，見。］
“權2”的被通假字。
(1)指祭祀中举火。
(2)古代祭祀用的火炬。参见“爟火”。
(3)祭祀中最先使用火的人。
(4)日常生活用火。
(5)报警的烽火。
(6)星名。属鬼宿，共四星，分属今之巨蟹座及双子座。

爟字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【火字部】　爟； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页687第36
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?古玩切，音貫。【說文】舉火曰爟。【周禮·夏官·司爟註】杜子春云：爟爲私火。鄭謂爟讀如予若觀火之觀。今燕俗名湯熱爲觀。則爟火謂熱火歟。【釋文】觀，古煥反。又【司爟】掌行火之政令，四時變國火，以救時疾。又凡祭祀則祭爟。【疏】謂祭先出火之人。　又【廣韻】烽火也。　又【集韻】逵員切，音權。亦烽火也。　又【周禮·夏官·司爟註】故書爟爲燋。◎按杜子春云：燋當爲爟。疏云：子春不從古書燋，還从爟。然註有此音，今存之。

Basic explanation of words
light a fire
guàn
Raise the fire: "The decree of the Si Guan in charge of the fire."
〔爟火〕The ancient sacrificial ceremonies remove the ominous torches.
The beacon of the ancient frontier police: "The beacon has not ceased."
light a fire
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［guàn］
["Guangyun" antiques cut, change it, see you. ]
"Quan 2" was passed falsely.
(1) Refers to the raising of fire during the sacrifice.
(2) The torch used in ancient sacrifices. See "爟火".
(3) The person who used fire first in the sacrifice.
(4) Fire in daily life.
(5) Beacon of the alarm.
(6) Star name. It belongs to the ghost lodging, with a total of four stars, belonging to the current Cancer and Gemini.
light a fire

[Si Collection] [Fire Word Department] 　爟; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 687 36
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Antique cut, sound throughout. [Said Wen] Raise the fire and say 爟. 【Zhou Li·Xiaguan·Siyan Note】Du Zichunyun: 爟 is a private fire. Zheng Wei's reading is like a view of fire. The common name of Yan Yan is Tang Hot. The fire is said to be hot. [Explanation] Guan, Gu Huananti. Also 【Si Yao】The government decree to carry out the fire, change the national fire at four times to save the time sickness. And where the sacrifices are sacrificed to the 爟. 【Sparse】It means to sacrifice the person who came out of the fire first.　[Guang Yun] Beacon fire also.　 [Ji Yun] Kui Yuan cut, sound right. Yi Fenghuo also.　[Zhou Li·Xiaguan·Si Yao's Note] Therefore, the book 爟 is 燋. ◎According to Du Zichunyun: 燋dang is 爟. Shuyun: Zichun does not follow the ancient books, but also from the 爟. However, this sound is noted, and it is preserved today.
